Package engine.launcher

Class Launcher

java.lang.Object
engine.launcher.Launcher
public class Launcher extends Object
The Launcher class provides the user with a GUI to input simulation parameters and then launches the simulation with the specified settings.

      Creates the "Run simulation" button and adds an action listener.

      private void createPresetsMenu()

      Runs the simulation with the specified settings and disposes of the frame.

    • loadParametersFromFile

      private void loadParametersFromFile(String filepath)
      Loads the parameters from a file, if it exists.

    • loadParametersFromPreset

      private void loadParametersFromPreset(String presetName)
      Loads the parameters from a preset file and applies them.
      Parameters:
      presetName - The name of the preset to load.

    • savePreset

      private void savePreset()
      Saves the current parameters as a new preset. Prompts the user to enter a preset name using JOptionPane. If a valid name is provided, saves the parameters to the corresponding preset file. If the preset is new, adds it to the presetsComboBox. Sets the selected item in the presetsComboBox to the newly saved preset.

    • deletePreset

      private void deletePreset()
      Deletes the selected preset. Removes the preset file if it exists. Removes the preset from the presetsComboBox.

    • presetExists

      private boolean presetExists(String presetName)
      Checks if a preset with the given name exists in the presetsComboBox.
      Parameters:
      presetName - The name of the preset to check.
      Returns:
      true if the preset exists, false otherwise.
